result.purpose: Provides functions to encrypt and decrypt data using AES encryption in CBC mode.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating encryption functionality and its tests within a dedicated package.

pkg/crypto/encrypt/encrypt.go.purpose: Provides functions to encrypt and decrypt data using AES encryption in CBC mode.
risks: Potential for padding oracle attacks if not used correctly

pkg/crypto/encrypt/encrypt_test.go.purpose: This file contains tests for the encryption functionality.
side_effects: Errors are reported through the testing framework
risks: Potential exposure of sensitive data in logs
